snippet: Enrico Battaglin sprinted to victory on cobbled, rain-slicked streets in the fourth stage of the Giro d’Italia, while his fellow Italian Luca Paolini kept the overall lead.
abstract: Enrico Battaglin sprints to victory on rain-slicked streets in fourth stage of Giro d’Italia bicycle race; fellow Italian Luca Paolini keeps overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Enrico Battaglin sprinted to victory on cobbled, rain-slicked streets in the fourth stage of the Giro d’Italia, while his fellow Italian Luca Paolini kept the overall lead.
